title: surveydown workshop
text:
1. Install R & Quarto
You need both:

Install 
Install Quarto

We also recommend working with an IDE that has good support for R, Quarto, and Shiny.
RStudio is great, and we also like VSCode and Positron.


2. Install the surveydown and sdApps R packages
We recommend installing the development versions of surveydown and sdApps from GitHub:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak(c("surveydown-dev/surveydown", "surveydown-dev/sdApps"))

title: surveydown workshop
text:
A workshop on building surveys with the surveydown platform





Learn the basic structure of a surveydown survey and create your first survey


PART 1: Getting Started







Take control over page navigation and content display based on question responses


PART 2: Conditional Control







Setup up your database to store response data and dynamically use the data in your survey


PART 3: Data Handling







Leverage shiny’s powerful reactivity framework to make your surveys more dynamic


PART 4: Reactivity
